persons.name: Aisha Patel
persons.physicalDescription: Black hair, brown eyes, small build. Speaks Gujarati and English. Height approximately 4'2". Wears glasses with purple frames.
persons.additionalDetails: Aisha was separated from her family during a crowded festival in Mumbai on April 10, 2023. She remembers her parents' names (Rajesh and Meena Patel) and says they live in Ahmedabad. She was visiting Mumbai with her family for a relative's wedding.

reportingEntity.name: Mumbai Child Services
reportingEntity.address: Municipal Building, Floor 3, Marine Drive, Mumbai, India

persons.name: Raj Kumar
persons.physicalDescription: Tall, dark complexion, short black hair. Has a scar on his right hand. Last seen wearing a blue shirt and jeans.
persons.additionalDetails: Raj is a software engineer who went missing after leaving work on March 14. His colleagues reported that he seemed distressed that day. His phone and wallet were found at his apartment.

reportingEntity.name: Delhi Police
reportingEntity.address: Delhi Police Headquarters, ITO, Delhi, India

persons.name: Maya Reddy
persons.physicalDescription: Medium height, light brown complexion, long black hair usually braided. Has a small birthmark on her forehead.
persons.additionalDetails: Maya lost her parents in a car accident in January 2023. She has no known relatives in the area. She is currently staying at the Hope Children's Home in Hyderabad.
